Thomas Edward Barter bụ onye ahịa Cape Coast na narị afọ nke iri na asaa.

A maara na mpaghara dịka Tom Ewusi, a mụrụ ya nwa nwoke nke nne na nna Afro-European;  ihe a kpọziri mulatto.  Ụlọ ọrụ Royal African zigara ya England na 1690 maka agụmakwụkwọ nna ya.  Ọ laghachiri na Cape Coast na 1693 wee were ya dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ maka ndị Britain.  Ọ ghọrọ onye ahịa nọọrọ onwe ya wee bụrụ onye a ma ama dịka onye isi ahịa na Cape Coast
